snippet: Juan E. Méndez, the United Nations’ special rapporteur on torture, said those responsible for C.I.A. abuses need to be punished.
lead_paragraph: Juan E. Méndez, the United Nations’ special rapporteur on torture, said those responsible for C.I.A. abuses need to be punished.

headline.main: Torture Fight Set Back by U.S. Failure to Prosecute, U.N. Official Says

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
